#include <iostream>
#include <vector>
 
using namespace std;
typedef long long int64;
int main(){
	int64 T;
	int64 x, y, z;
	int64 a, d, n;
	cin >> T;
	while(T--){
		cin >> x >> y >> z;
		n = 2*z/(x+y);
		d = (y-x)/(n-5);
		a = x-2*d;
		cout << n << endl;
		for(int64 i=0;i<n;i++){
			cout << a << " ";
			a += d;
		}
		cout << endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
